author: lwang046
body:
#### PR description:

This PR updates the event type assignment for HFRaddam calibration events. Affects the plots under the Hcalcalib folder. 

#### PR validation:

Passed `runTheMatrix.py -l limited -i all --ibeos`, plots show expected changes in private DQM GUI test.
title: HcalDQM: Fix HFRaddam event type
